if nothing is changed on screen

Looking for: description in the language of the current user
Looking for: any translations (box on the button)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OMN011]: Ledger numbers in program copy numbers')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO, LDGR.LDGR_NO, LDGR.LDGR_NAME, LDGR.LDGR_TAXPERCCLIENT, LDGR.LDGR_NO_TAXAMOUNTS, LDGR.LDGR_PASSCHANGESTOEXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_CURRENCY, LDGR.LDGR_PREVTAXPERCCLIENT, LDGR.LDGR_PREVTAXPERCDATE, LDGR.LDGR_COST_NO_MANDATORY, LDGR.LDGR_COST_NO_DEFAULT, LDGR.LDGR_SUMCHANGESTOEXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_LEDGERTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_NEWBALANCE, LDGR.LDGR_MANUALBOOKINGNOTALL, LDGR.LDGR_USEFORPERIODICALCOST, LDGR.LDGR_NO_EXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_PRINTONMONTHLYINVOICE, LDGR.LDGR_NO_IFNOTAXCALC, LDGR.LDGR_NO_EXTERNALGLPL, LDGR.LDGR_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMETYPE, LDGR.LDGR_NO_ONMONTHLYINVOICE, LDGR.LDGR_PKWIU, LDGR.LDGR_TRANSACTIONTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMESUBTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_EXTRAPERMISSIONREQUIRED, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMETYPEVORTEX from :1/LDGR LDGR where LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO = :2 and LDGR.LDGR_NO in (select ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO from :1/ADML ADML where ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO > 0 and ADML.ADML_ADMN_NO = :2 group by ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO) and not exists (select * from :1/LDGR LDGR1 where LDGR1.LDGR_ADMNO = :3 and LDGR1.LDGR_NO = LDGR.LDGR_NO) for fetch only

select LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO, LDGR.LDGR_NO, LDGR.LDGR_NAME, LDGR.LDGR_TAXPERCCLIENT, LDGR.LDGR_NO_TAXAMOUNTS, LDGR.LDGR_PASSCHANGESTOEXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_CURRENCY, LDGR.LDGR_PREVTAXPERCCLIENT, LDGR.LDGR_PREVTAXPERCDATE, LDGR.LDGR_COST_NO_MANDATORY, LDGR.LDGR_COST_NO_DEFAULT, LDGR.LDGR_SUMCHANGESTOEXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_LEDGERTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_NEWBALANCE, LDGR.LDGR_MANUALBOOKINGNOTALL, LDGR.LDGR_USEFORPERIODICALCOST, LDGR.LDGR_NO_EXTERNALGL, LDGR.LDGR_PRINTONMONTHLYINVOICE, LDGR.LDGR_NO_IFNOTAXCALC, LDGR.LDGR_NO_EXTERNALGLPL, LDGR.LDGR_MONTHLYINVOICETYPE, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMETYPE, LDGR.LDGR_NO_ONMONTHLYINVOICE, LDGR.LDGR_PKWIU, LDGR.LDGR_TRANSACTIONTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMESUBTYPE, LDGR.LDGR_EXTRAPERMISSIONREQUIRED, LDGR.LDGR_INCOMETYPEVORTEX from :1/LDGR LDGR where LDGR.LDGR_ADMNO = :2 and LDGR.LDGR_NO in (select CDPL.CDPL_LEDGERNO from :1/CDPL CDPL where CDPL.CDPL_LEDGERNO > 0 and CDPL.CDPL_ADMN_NO = :2 group by CDPL.CDPL_LEDGERNO) and not exists (select * from :1/LDGR LDGR1 where LDGR1.LDGR_ADMNO = :3 and LDGR1.LDGR_NO = LDGR.LDGR_NO) for fetch only

select ADML.ADML_ADMN_NO, ADML.ADML_LTYP_TYPE, ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO, ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO_IFNOTAXCALC from :1/ADML ADML where ADML.ADML_ADMN_NO = :2 and not exists (select * from :1/ADML ADML1 where ADML1.ADML_ADMN_NO = :3 and ADML1.ADML_LTYP_TYPE = ADML.ADML_LTYP_TYPE) for fetch only

select CDPL.CDPL_ADMN_NO, CDPL.CDPL_CDEP_TYPE, CDPL.CDPL_CDEP_PURPOSE, CDPL.CDPL_LEDGERNO from :1/CDPL CDPL where CDPL.CDPL_ADMN_NO = :2 and not exists (select * from :1/CDPL CDPL1 where CDPL1.CDPL_ADMN_NO = :3 and CDPL1.CDPL_CDEP_TYPE = CDPL.CDPL_CDEP_TYPE and CDPL1.CDPL_CDEP_PURPOSE = CDPL.CDPL_CDEP_PURPOSE) for fetch only

select LDID.LDID_LDGR_ADMNO, LDID.LDID_LDGR_NO, LDID.LDID_LANGUAGE, LDID.LDID_LINENO, LDID.LDID_TEXT from :1/LDID LDID where LDID.LDID_LDGR_ADMNO = :2 and LDID.LDID_LDGR_NO in (select ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO from :1/ADML ADML where ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO > 0 and ADML.ADML_ADMN_NO = :2 group by ADML.ADML_LEDGERNO) and not exists (select * from :1/LDID LDID1 where LDID1.LDID_LDGR_ADMNO = :3 and LDID1.LDID_LDGR_NO = LDID.LDID_LDGR_NO) for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,2},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR {0,9})
MlsTrans ('SCR[OMN011]: Ledger numbers in program details')

Text.val: 09.01.2006 BT SCR9906 removed check task 'tabular view ADML'
Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit

Header.Description: Check sum of rows in tableADML

FormName.valUnicode: Check sum of rows in tableADML

ExpSyntax.val: {0,7}<>'Y' AND NOT ({0,21}) AND Stat (0,'M'MODE) AND VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR)
MlsTrans ('SCR[OMN011]: Ledger numbers in program details')
{0,11}<>'Y' AND NOT ({0,30}) AND Stat (0,'M'MODE) AND VarMod ('{0,14}'VAR)
